name: We Fit
description:
We Fit is about what you do when you and three of your square friends are about to get crushed by a metal wall. The only solution here is assimilation. Quickly find the way to fit everyone in the wall.

The game was made by 4 handsome guys during the Global Game Jam 2015.

Team

  • Fabrice Joly (Graphics), http://magillustrateur.ch
  • David Roulin (Code), http://silverthorax.com
  • Julien Matthey (Sound), http://www.thesounddesignerblog.com
  • Sandro Dall'Aglio (Game Design), http://uncoindepixel.ch

Music by Vincenzo https://soundcloud.com/vincenzo

Change Log

v1.3.1 - 03 February 2017
- upgraded to Löve2D 0.10
- fixed bug with settings menu

v1.3 - 24 January 2017 (Ludicious build)
- added a 4-player-on-2-gamepads mode

v1.2 - 28 May 2016
- fixed initial speed

v1.1 - 07 May 2016
- added gamepad support in menus

v1.0 - 04 April 2016
